results.name: Take sum of squares of digits of previous term; start with 74169.
comment: From a quiz, cf. Russel & Carter reference.
reference: K. Russell and P. Carter, Number Puzzles, W. Foulsham and Co. Ltd. (1993).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1).
xref: Cf. A000216 (main entry for related sequences), A003132 (the iterated "sum digits squared" map).
